title: ‘GM Street’ — Da Bears' QB Conundrum With Mike Lombardi (Ep. 106)
description:
The Ringer's Mike Lombardi and Tate Frazier talk quarterback drama in Chicago (01:00), positive vibes for the Chargers (09:00), fifth-year options (16:00), the Broncos signing Jamaal Charles (22:00), Jay Cutler the broadcaster (24:00), and top prospects sitting out future bowl games (27:00).
      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
